title: Athletism — Grappling (Elite) — Phase 1: GPP & Movement Quality
equipment: Mat space (tatami, wrestling mats, grappling dummy)
Gym: rack, barbells, dumbbells, kettlebells, cables
Grip tools (fat grips, gi pull‑up handles, towels)
goal: Rebuild base movement patterns, joint capacity, and aerobic foundation.

warmup: Activation 6–8' (glute med, deep core, scap control)
Grappling flow drills: hip escapes, bridges, shrimps, rolls
main: Strength (full): Back Squat 4x6, RDL 3x8, Split Squat 3x8/leg
Mat drills: hip escape 4x10m, shoulder rolls 3x10

notes: Week 1: General base, Z2 conditioning. Week 2: +10% volume; add eccentrics.
